resources.string: Spirobank Smart QOL App
Settings
Welcome to the Home Spirometry study. Please enter the password to proceed.
If you do not remember the password, please contact (911) 911-9111 for the correct password
The spirometer is not connected.\n\nPlease make sure that the spirometer has sufficient battery and is turned on.
Please enable bluetooth on the tablet to connect to the spirometer and proceed with the test

Please complete a short survey.

You will be asked whether you have any new symptoms. 

When given a single YES or NO option whether you have any of the listed symptoms, you will be presented with a YES OR NO option for each of the symptoms. Please select YES or NO for each of the symptoms.
1. A NEW cough, runny nose, sore throat, fever, shaking chills, muscle aches or recent diarrhea? Yes or No
2. A NEW cough, or cough now producing sputum/mucus, new wheezing or new shortness of breath? Yes or No
3. A NEW generalized weakness, lightheadedness or dizziness? Yes or No
4. A NEW shortness of breath at rest, on exertion or when lying flat, new shortness of breath that awakens you from sleep or new swelling in your feet or legs? Yes or No
Check each symptom that is NEW:
